english.segment1: Why do we shoot our wounded I don't understand once when we were down and out he gave us his hand can't we give back to who has given to us I expect to stumble all my life i expect to pull through with strength in christ I will brothers together we should stand hand in hand why do we shoot our wounded I don't understand never turn my back on my brother i will never stand to watch you suffer I will reach out to lift you from this pain.
